User.php

Summary
User.php
UserUser table definition
UserSuperclass which holds the table Definition for users
schemaDefReturns the schema definition of the database in an array format
getProfileReturns the profile associated with a user
sameAsChecks if this user’s profile is the same as another’s
getUriReturns the URI for the user
getNicknameReturns the nickname for this user
getByNicknameReturns the user on the server with a given nickname
isSubscribedReturns true/false whether the user is subscribed to the specified other profile
hasPendingSubscriptionReturns true/false whether user has a subscription pending to the specified other profile
getCurrentNoticeGet the most recent notice posted by this user, if any.
getCarrierReturns the carrier used by a user for SMS notifications if one is specified (null if not)
registerRegister a new user account and profile and set up default subscriptions.
emailChangedThings we do when the email changes
mutuallySubscribedReturns boolean true/false as to whether this user is a mutual subscriber with the given profile.
mutuallySubscribedUsersFinds the mutually-subscribed users of a user
getRepliesDisplay x amount of replies to a user
getTaggedNoticesDisplay x amount of tagged notices of a user’s
getNoticesDisplay x amount of notices from a user
blockAdd a block record for this user for a given other profile
unblockRemove a block record for this user of a given other profile
isMemberReturns true/false whether a user is member of a given group
isAdminReturns true/false whether a user is an admin of a given group (bit of a misleading name in that regard...)
getGroupsReturns all the usergroups that this user is a member of (up to $limit if specified)
joinGroupRequest to join the given group.
leaveGroupLeave a group that this user is a member of.
getSubscribedReturns an array of profiles this user is subscribed to
getScubscribersReturns an array of profiles that subscribe to this user
getTaggedSubscribersReturns an array of profiles that this user is subscribed to and possess a given peopletag
getTaggedSubscriptionsReturns an array of profiles that subscribe to this user and possess a given peopletag
hasRightReturns boolean true/false whether a user has a specified right
deleteDelete this user
_deleteTagsHelper function for user deletion that deletes all tags created by this user.
_deleteBlocksHelper function for user deletion that deletes all block records created by this users.
hasRoleReturns true/false whether the user has a given role
grantRoleGrant a role to this user
revokeRoleRemove a role from this user
isSandboxedReturns true/false whether this user is sandboxed or not
isSilencedReturns true/false whether this user is banned (silenced) or not
receivesEmailNotificationsReturns true/false as to whether this user receives email noticifications
repeatedByMeReturns the first $limit notices repeated by a user, starting at $offset
repeatsOfMeReturns the first $limit notices that the user posted and was repeated, starting at $offset.
repeatedToMeReturns the first $limit notices directly mentioning a user that were repeated, starting at $offset
siteOwnerReturns an account that is the site owner
singleUserPull the primary site account to use in single-user mode.
singleUserNicknameThis is kind of a hack for using external setup code that’s trying to build single-user sites.
shortenLinksFind and shorten links in the given text using this user’s URL shortening settings.
getConnectedAppsGet a list of OAuth client applications that have access to this user’s account.
__sleepMagic function called at serialize() time.
recoverPasswordSend a password-recovery email for the user
streamModeOnlyReturns if the user has stream-only mode enabled (old-school setting)
streamNicknamesReturns if the user has stream nicknames enabled (old-school setting)
registrationActivityCreates and returns an ActivityVerb (ostatus 0.5) of a registration.
isPrivateStreamReturns true/false whether an account is private
hasPasswordReturns true/false whether an account has a password
setPasswordSet a new password for this user
delPrefDelete a preference record for a user
getPrefReturns a preference record for a user
getConfigPrefReturns a configuration preference for a user
setPrefSets a user preference record for a user

User

Superclass which holds the table Definition for users

Constants

  • SUBSCRIBE_POLICY_OPEN = 0;
  • SUBSCRIBE_POLICY_MODERATE = 1;

Variables

  • __table = ‘user’ - table name
  • id - int(4) primary_key not_null
  • nickname - varchar(64) unique_key
  • password - varchar(191) not 255 because utf8mb4 takes more space
  • email - varchar(191) unique_key not 255 because utf8mb4 takes more space
  • incomingemail - varchar(191) unique_key not 255 because utf8mb4 takes more space
  • emailnotifysub - tinyint(1) default_1
  • emailnotifyfav - tinyint(1) default_1
  • emailnotifynudge - tinyint(1) default_1
  • emailnotifymsg - tinyint(1) default_1
  • emailnotifyattn - tinyint(1) default_1
  • language - varchar(50)
  • timezone - varchar(50)
  • emailpost - tinyint(1) default_1
  • sms - varchar(64) unique_key
  • carrier - int(4)
  • smsnotify - tinyint(1)
  • smsreplies - tinyint(1)
  • smsemail - varchar(191) not 255 because utf8mb4 takes more space
  • uri - varchar(191) unique_key not 255 because utf8mb4 takes more space
  • autosubscribe - tinyint(1)
  • subscribe_policy - tinyint(1)
  • urlshorteningservice - varchar(50) default_ur1.ca
  • private_stream - tinyint(1) default_0
  • created - datetime() not_null
  • modified - timestamp() not_null default_CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

schemaDef

public static function schemaDef()

Returns the schema definition of the database in an array format

getProfile

public function getProfile()

Returns the profile associated with a user

Returns

  • profile Profile

Error States

  • throws UserNoProfileException if user has no profile

sameAs

public function sameAs(Profile $other)

Checks if this user’s profile is the same as another’s

getUri

public function getUri()

Returns the URI for the user

getNickname

public function getNickname()

Returns the nickname for this user

getByNickname

static function getByNickname($nickname)

Returns the user on the server with a given nickname

Error States

  • throws NoSuchUserException if a user is not found with that nickname

isSubscribed

function isSubscribed(Profile $other)

Returns true/false whether the user is subscribed to the specified other profile

hasPendingSubscription

function hasPendingSubscription(Profile $other)

Returns true/false whether user has a subscription pending to the specified other profile

getCurrentNotice

function getCurrentNotice()

Get the most recent notice posted by this user, if any.

Returns

  • notice Notice or null

getCarrier

function getCarrier()

Returns the carrier used by a user for SMS notifications if one is specified (null if not)

register

static function register(array $fields,  
 $accept_email_fail = false)

Register a new user account and profile and set up default subscriptions.  If a new-user welcome message is configured, this will be sent.

Parameters

  • array $fields associative array of optional properties
  • string ‘bio’
  • string ‘email’
  • bool ‘email_confirmed’ pass true to mark email as pre-confirmed
  • string ‘fullname’
  • string ‘homepage’
  • string ‘location’ informal string description of geolocation
  • float ‘lat’ decimal latitude for geolocation
  • float ‘lon’ decimal longitude for geolocation
  • int ‘location_id’ geoname identifier
  • int ‘location_ns’ geoname namespace to interpret location_id
  • string ‘nickname’ REQUIRED
  • string ‘password’ (may be missing for eg OpenID registrations)
  • string ‘code’ invite code
  • ?string ‘uri’ permalink to notice; defaults to local notice URL

Returns

  • User object

Error States

  • throws Exception on failure

emailChanged

function emailChanged()

Things we do when the email changes

mutuallySubscribed

function mutuallySubscribed(Profile $other)

Returns boolean true/false as to whether this user is a mutual subscriber with the given profile.

mutuallySubscribedUsers

function mutuallySubscribedUsers()

Finds the mutually-subscribed users of a user

$limit = NOTICES_PER_PAGE,
$since_id = 0,
$before_id = 0)

$offset = 0,

  • boolean success

getGroups

function getGroups($offset = 0,
$limit = null)

function joinGroup(User_group $group)

Request to join the given group.  May throw exceptions on failure.

Parameters

  • User_group $group

Returns

  • group_member

Parameters

receivesEmailNotifications

function receivesEmailNotifications()

Returns true/false as to whether this user receives email noticifications

We could do this in one large if statement, but that’s not as easy to read Don’t send notifications if we don’t know the user’s email address or it is explicitly undesired by the user’s own settings.

repeatedByMe

function repeatedByMe($offset = 0,
$limit = 20,
$since_id = null,
$max_id = null)

Returns the first $limit notices repeated by a user, starting at $offset

repeatsOfMe

function repeatsOfMe($offset = 0,
$limit = 20,
$since_id = null,
$max_id = null)

Returns the first $limit notices that the user posted and was repeated, starting at $offset.

repeatedToMe

public function repeatedToMe($offset = 0,
$limit = 20,
$since_id = null,
$max_id = null)

Returns the first $limit notices directly mentioning a user that were repeated, starting at $offset

siteOwner

public static function siteOwner()

Returns an account that is the site owner

singleUser

public static function singleUser()

Pull the primary site account to use in single-user mode.  If a valid user nickname is listed in ‘singleuser’:’nickname’ in the config, this will be used; otherwise the site owner account is taken by default.

Returns

  • User

Error States

  • throws ServerException if no valid single user account is present
  • throws ServerException if called when not in single-user mode

singleUserNickname

static function singleUserNickname()

This is kind of a hack for using external setup code that’s trying to build single-user sites.

Will still return a username if the config singleuser/nickname is set even if the account doesn’t exist, which normally indicates that the site is horribly misconfigured.

At the moment, we need to let it through so that router setup can complete, otherwise we won’t be able to create the account.

This will be easier when we can more easily create the account and then switch the site to 1user mode without jumping through hoops.

Returns

  • string

Error States

  • throws ServerException if no valid single user account is present
  • throws ServerException if called when not in single-user mode

shortenLinks

public function shortenLinks($text,  
$always = false)

Find and shorten links in the given text using this user’s URL shortening settings.

By default, links will be left untouched if the text is shorter than the configured maximum notice length.  Pass true for the $always parameter to force all links to be shortened regardless.

Side effects: may save file and file_redirection records for referenced URLs.

Parameters

  • string $text
  • boolean $always

Returns

  • string

getConnectedApps

function getConnectedApps($offset =  0,
$limit =  null)

Get a list of OAuth client applications that have access to this user’s account.

__sleep

function __sleep()

Magic function called at serialize() time.

We use this to drop a couple process-specific references from DB_DataObject which can cause trouble in future processes.

Returns

  • array of variable names to include in serialization.

recoverPassword

static function recoverPassword($nore)

Send a password-recovery email for the user

function streamModeOnly()

Returns if the user has stream-only mode enabled (old-school setting)

streamNicknames

function streamNicknames()

Returns if the user has stream nicknames enabled (old-school setting)

function registrationActivity()
